April 23, 1932 D Helston Contest (Third Section)
Helston Contest (Third Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Helston Contest helston-contest-third-section
None
A Village Pastoral
Helston, Cornwall
Prizes - 1st £8, 2nd £5, 3rd £3, 4th £2. Hymn tune - 1st Camborne Juniors, 2nd St Stithians. 6 bands competed.
Jan. 12, 2014, 10:14 p.m. Dec. 7, 2016, 11:23 a.m.

2 Camborne Junior Contesting J. Eustace
